title: Functional Roles
description: Controlled vocabulary for functional roles in agentic automation projects

roles.label: Project Lead
roles.description: Primary person responsible for overall project direction and coordination

roles.label: Developer
roles.description: Person responsible for developing and implementing the automation system

roles.label: Researcher
roles.description: Person conducting research or analysis related to the project

roles.label: Data Manager
roles.description: Person responsible for managing data access, quality, and compliance

roles.label: Stakeholder
roles.description: Person with an interest in the project outcomes but not directly involved in development

roles.label: Compliance Officer
roles.description: Person responsible for ensuring regulatory and compliance requirements are met

roles.label: End User
roles.description: Person who will use the automation system in their daily work

roles.label: Domain Expert
roles.description: Person with specialized knowledge in the domain where automation is applied

roles.label: Technical Lead
roles.description: Person responsible for technical architecture and technical decision-making

roles.label: Project Manager
roles.description: Person responsible for project planning, scheduling, and resource management
